articles.title: NASA made enough oxygen on Mars to last an astronaut for 100 minutes

articles.title: DeepMind AI learns to play soccer using decades of match simulations
articles.description: An artificial intelligence learned to skilfully control digital humanoid soccer players by working through decades worth of soccer matches in just a few weeks

articles.title: Magnetic gearbox could power robots to crawl or jump inside your body

articles.title: Protons inside some types of hydrogen and helium are behaving weirdly
articles.description: In some types of helium and hydrogen, protons are four times more likely to pair up than they are in other atoms – which may mean there’s something we don’t understand about the strong nuclear force

articles.title: Early mammals lived faster and died younger than modern ones
articles.description: The extinction of the dinosaurs left an ecological hole that was quickly filled by mammals, which rapidly developed larger bodies. Now it seems this evolutionary growth spurt was a result of living life in fast forward
articles.content:
By Riley Black
An artist’s impression of Pantolambda
Florilegius / Alamy

articles.title: Compression socks may prevent nausea and loose bowels during marathons
articles.description: Stomach cramps and the urgent need for the toilet on long runs may partly be caused by decreased blood flow damaging gut cells. Compression socks reduce signs of this damage in marathon runners
